title: Perfect Location, Pets Welcome, Patio or Balcony, WD
posting_body: ["The Berkeley is conveniently located in northwest Denver with quick access to the RTD G-line, the Highlands, Sloan's Lake, downtown Denver and I-70.", 'Our apartment community is situated across the street from Willis Case Golf Course and just a few blocks east of Regis University.', 'This location offers rare, community feel in an urban location at competitive prices.', 'While close to downtown, The Berkeley is situated in a residential neighborhood, just blocks from parks and dining.', 'This two bedroom one bathroom apartment features a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar, entry and linen closets, and a washer/dryer!', "The Berkeley is conveniently located in northwest Denver with quick access to the RTD G-line, the Highlands, Sloan's Lake, downtown Denver, and I-70.", 'Great in-unit and onsite amenities, our community offers quick access to everyday essentials, recreation, and entertainment.', 'This apartment requires a $250 deposit.', 'VIEW OUR WEBSITE:', '<URL>/', 'The Berkeley , managed by BLDG Management', '4703 W 52nd Ave', 'Denver, CO 80212', 'show contact info', 'Community Features', '* Easy Freeway Access', '* Credit Cards Accepted', '* After-Hours Emergency Maintenance', '* Reserved Parking', '* Minutes from Restaurants, Shopping, and Much More', '* Professionally Managed', '* Guest Parking', '* Corporate Housing', '* We are a social community!', 'Find our Yelp, Facebook or Twitter page online.', '* Swimming Pool', '* Spa', '* Renters Insurance is Required', '* Easy Access to Public Transportation', '* Outdoor Grill Area', '* Bike Racks', '*', "Our prices can change daily, price listed is based on today's availability.", 'Call for details.', '* Sun Deck']
